Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Condition.participant.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Condition.participant.actor` has a context of Condition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Condition`.
